page.title: 05AT HOME ON THE FARM.
page.content: My name is Katrina, I am five and I live on a farm in Kilchrenan. Today I am living in my home with my Mum and Dad, Michael, Kathleen and my Auntie Gwen, who has come to visit with my cousins,David and Shona. There are dogs, a cat, sheep and lambs, cows and calves, a bull called Topaz, ducks, hens and donkeys on my farm. My dad is a farmer and he has a special motorbike to whizz round the sheep especially at lambing time. I like to help because I get a ride on the three wheeler bike. One time I got a ride on a helicopter when it was spraying the hills to kill the thistles and gorse. The sheep and cattle do not eat these. When I am not at school I like to help my dad on the farm or go fishing with him.
